EmailTemplate.description: Email to send to an Insurer requesting their reply for when a worker submits an application for Merit Review
EmailTemplate.name: Email to Insurer requesting lodgement of reply
EmailTemplate.subject: New Application - Reply to Required {CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
We acknowledge receipt of an application for merit review received by the Merit Review Service on {dateTimeStamp} from {workerContact}.
The Authority request you lodge a completed ‘Work capacity – reply to an application for merit review by the authority’ form as quickly as possible and preferably within 7 days due on {dueDate}.
Please access this case via the link {caseLink}.
If you need assistance please do not hesitate to contact us via email mrs@sira.nsw.gov.au or call us on 02 9284 2284.
Yours sincerely
Merit Review Service
